County Commission.name: County Commission
County Commission.description: On the county websites, you can send a public records request, learn about each commissioner and what districts they represent, learn the district boundaries, and find the meeting videos and agendas.

School Board.name: School Board
School Board.description: Through the school board site you can find the current superintendent, the board members, and the district's finances.

Sheriff's Office.name: Sheriffs Office
Sheriff's Office.description: Through the Sheriff's website, you can submit public records requests, find contact numbers for agencies, and sign up for a ride-along.

Property Appraiser.name: Property Appraiser
Property Appraiser.description: Run property searches through the Property Appraiser site.

Clerk of Court.name: Clerk of Court
Clerk of Court.description: The clerk of court site will help find details about a case.

Tax Collector.name: Tax Collector
Tax Collector.description: Through the tax collector site you can find property taxes and if a person has a homestead exemption.

Jail.name: Jail
Jail.description: Find the name, age, sex, race, pod and booking date of an inmate.
